reviewText: I have a PlayStation 3 will it play on there and I'm from the u.s too. Any help anyone can help me thanks.
I love it Thank You so much!!!!!!

This dvd is a very good option for those collectors who wants to owns all jem's merchandise possible, and is an excellent alternative for those people that could not buy the Rhino dvd's (which are already out of print since 2005),Jem the movie was released originally by 1986 for VHS format and  as the seller explains is a compilation of the 5 first episodes:

1- THE BEGINNING

2- DISASTER (AKA SETBACKS)

3- KIMBER'S REBELLION

4- FRAME UP

5- THE BATTLE OF THE BANDS

Originally jem was a 15 minutes part of Super saturday (Along with Robotix and Big Foot and the monster machines), Sunbow started to launch those fabulous cartoons like GIJOE with the purpose to sell the action figures and the dolls in this case..after some weeks the soap operah was a success and Christy Marx started to create the full episodes show brodacasted on tv.

  There's some little differences between the full episodes and the movie by example the music clips are shorter and usually shows parts from another ones /// also you'll find some extra scenes that were cutted off or edited to be released on tv...and  there some extra sound effects added for this version but in general still capturing the same idea: Jem and the holograms are always on top of the charts and the Misfits are basicly "out of the way", the movie ends with episode number 5: Battle of the bands excatly at the moment that the holograms win but you won't see details..like when Howard Sanz award em with the movie contract and the Starlight mansion ..but anyways, still being fair enough , i just hope Sony release the second part of the third  season ..when Hollywood Jem and THE STINGERS hits the town..!!!!
